name: Dodgeballs.io (itch)
description:
Dodgeballs.io is a massive multiplayer action io game that is a free for all game of dodgeball. No registration required!

You pick up balls that are scattered around the area, and throw them at other players. If you get hit by another players ball, you die. This game features an in-game chat, unlimited levels, and a global leaderboard in which you can check how your skill compares to other players!

Level up your character by killing other players, and use the experience you gain to level up your throw speed, dodgeball size, and player speed.

Your score is how many players you killed, and the person with the most kills without dying is the highest on the leaderboards. This game was surprisingly addicting, even though it is fairly new.

Climb the leaderboards and become the #1 player in the game!
